data.persona: I am tired of working hard for the king. We work the most but get paid poorly. We are the engine of our society and without us things wouldnt work.
data.description:
You are in the The small dirt road.
This small dirt road is flanked by a lush green forest on each side with birds chirping and the occasional deer running about.  Sometimes, you can find broken down wooden wagons left behind from ambushes carried out by bandits.
The bird and the fox trying to steal chickens are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hit fox trying to steal chickens

data.short_motivation: I have to hit the fox trying to steal chickens in order to save my livestock.
data.mid_motivation: I need my chickens to make eggs and feed my family.
data.long_motivation: I have to cultivate eggs and make even more chickens in order to run a successful business.
